results.name: Triangular table A286563 reversed.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..7875; the first 125 rows of the triangle
example: The first fifteen rows of this triangular table:
mathematica: Table[If[k == 1, 1, IntegerExponent[n, k]], {n, 15}, {k, n, 1, -1}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 20 2017 *)
program: for n in range(1, 21): print [T(n, k) for k in range(1, n + 1)] [::-1] # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 20 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 20 2017
